includedAssets.title: Episode 1
includedAssets.synopsis: When the body of an 11-year-old boy is found on a beach in Dorset, local police officers DS Ellie Miller and DI Alec Hardy are called to investigate.

includedAssets.title: Episode 2
includedAssets.synopsis: As the mystery around Danny Latimer's death deepens, Hardy and Miller have to work fast.

includedAssets.title: Episode 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Fingerprints at the murder scene lead DI Hardy and DS Miller to a startling suspect.

includedAssets.title: Episode 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Distraught by the lack of press coverage, Beth and Mark take matters into their own hands.

includedAssets.title: Episode 5

includedAssets.title: Episode 7
includedAssets.synopsis: Time is running out to solve Danny's murder - will a vital clue finally unlock the case?

includedAssets.synopsis: The town of Broadchurch is left in a state of shock as Hardy finally discovers Danny Latimer's killer.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: David Tennant and Olivia Colman star in this crime thriller set in the seaside resort of Broadchurch. Two local detectives are called to investigate when the body of an 11-year-old boy is found on a beach.
